summary: This is a mod that replaces the music of Skyrim with fairy tail music.
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod that replaces the music of Skyrim with fairy tail music.

list of songs added:

Main Menu:
01. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m6kb96YWXMA]Fairy Tail Main Theme[/url]

Town:
08. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HDq3ejK8Wk8]A bust street[/url]
09. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5FCLFKs--m4]Fantasia[/url]
18. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S_K7Few6IwA]Exceeds[/url]
20. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2bbCj_Xbyns]Rushii\'s theme[/url]
36. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DQC94-uUhfs]FAIRY TAIL-Slow version  Main Theme[/url]

Tavern:
06.[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_du3Pa4VjVI]Happy no Theme (Happys Theme)[/url]
13. People of the Floating Island
18. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GlV9PwOtraQ]Nakama Tachi\'s Peers[/url]
29. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pUj7pj2wKtQ[/url]Past Story[/url]

Forest day:
19. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NrbbldQeOE40]Home[/url]

Explore Day:
05 Atarashii Yuujou (New Friendship) (will upload myself later)
06. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_du3Pa4VjVI]Happy no Theme (Happys Theme)[/url]
18. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S_K7Few6IwA]Exceeds[/url]
27. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IpZfADlnfgs]Power of Justice[/url]
30 Ancient Magic (will upload myself later)

Explore Night:
04. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P6a4tUwM1nQ]Tsuioku ~Mezameru Tamashii~ (Reminiscence ~Awakening Soul~)[/url]
09. Midnight Awakens (will upload myself later)
15. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fbfeY9VRM0o]Shadows creeping[/url]
25. Kuraki Zankou (Dark Afterglow) (will upload myself later)
27. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kn-7wUzesa8]Rakuen no Tou (Heavens Tower)[/url]

Explore Dusk:
16. Having the Wings (will upload myself later)
22. Angels\' Anguish (will upload myself later)
35. Fiore Oukoku (Kingdom of Fiore) (will upload myself later)

Explore Morning:
06. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_du3Pa4VjVI]Happy no Theme (Happys Theme)[/url]
29. Kizuna (Bonds) (will upload myself later)

Combat:
02.[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kZocbL6y0AE]Theme of elsa[/url]
03.[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CZq88bs0kHs]Invoke magic[/url]
13.[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ON_-Ibgq_g]The theme of multiflora[/url]
26.[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0OxzZXyqk-0]Salamander[/url]
27.[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RMHH10BqXMw]Flying ice edge[/url]
28.[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tEmfdGUvy5U]Against magic[/url]
31.[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PdP58UtLGJU]Armor of titania[/url]
33.[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TX6rKETIaCw]Magic last[/url]
more coming...

Combat Finale:
shortened version of Dignified Rock version
author: visedgrunt

files.name: Fairy Tail music replacer v0_5
files.changelogHtml:
added music for exploring day
added music for exploring night
added music for exploring dusk
added music for exploring morning
